plugin.name: xwiki-rendering
plugin.author: Luis Arias
plugin.title: Provides XWiki Rendering in Grails
plugin.description:
\ The XWiki Rendering Plugin currently provides a xwikiRender gsp tag that allows you to embed any of the various wiki syntaxes that are supported. See here to learn more about the XWiki Rendering Module and its features:
http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Modules/RenderingModule
